title: The Angel and the rat
creator_credit: Insomnia Films, Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Stephen McDonald
brief_description: A short documentary which examines certain selected aspects of the personality, ideas and lifestyle of Smiley Williams a young sculptor with emphasis on his personal vision as a clue to understanding his creative process
